% =========================
% Custom commands (RAW)
% =========================
\newcommand{\cvheader}[3]{
    \begin{center}
        {\Huge\bfseries #1}\par
        {\large #2}\par
        #3
    \end{center}
    \vspace{0.5em}
}

\newcommand{\cventry}[4]{
    \noindent\textbf{#1}\hfill \textit{#2}\par
    \textit{#3}\hfill #4\par
    \vspace{0.2em}
}

\newcommand{\cvitem}[2]{
    \noindent\textbf{#1:} #2\par
}

\section*{Personal \& Academic Projects}


\noindent\textbf{\href{github.com/vitamin-0xff/resume-builder-latex}{Automated Marcket Cart}}\par
An automated market cart in terme of placing items and payment\par
\textit{Tech:} Android Jetpack Compose, Integrate Stripe for Payment, Nextjs for admin dashboard, Spring Boot for backend\par\vspace{0.4em}

\noindent\textbf{\href{github.com/vitamin-0xff/resume-builder-latex}{Automated Resume Builder (Data Driven CV)}}\par
A dynamic resume generator that creates LaTeX CVs from JSON data using Nunjucks templating engine.\par
\textit{Tech:} Latex, Nunjucks template engine, Typescript\par\vspace{0.4em}

\noindent\textbf{\href{github.com/vitamin-0xff/resume-builder-latex}{Job finder}}\par
A system built on the top of Typesense search engine, with scrapet data around the Tunisian jobs websites\par
\textit{Tech:} Typescript(Deno runtime), Typesense Search engine\par\vspace{0.4em}

\noindent\textbf{\href{github.com/vitamin-0xff/resume-builder-latex}{Mini Scraper}}\par
A set of functions that automated the scraping\par
\textit{Tech:} Typescript(Deno runtime)\par\vspace{0.4em}
